sub_title: Unilever Brand Manager | Master's in Marketing, Branding Expert
summary:
Hi, I am Lorenzo 👋
Brand crafter from the depth of my heart and breath of my mind.

I get fired up from brands and products that challenge the status quo and excitement from campaigns that touch people’s hearts and minds. Making a positive impact on someone’s life is what gets me out of bed energized and inspired every morning.

I have had the privilege of working with some of the world's biggest brands and delivering moments of joy to kids throughout Europe. I led the full product development process of tasty yet permissible ice creams specifically designed for Kids #ResponsiblyMadeForKids – underpinned by strict nutritional standards & a responsible communication plan for the entire Wall's Kids range 👶. The effort was highly valuable, not just for me in terms of learning curve, but also for society and the brand's sales.

While working on Dove, I contributed at reshaping beauty standards in the haircare category by leading Global innovations and communication campaigns. I launched a new haircare regime of natural shampoo, conditioners & treatment formats covering the top 4 haircare needs while offering new claims and usage applications. This brought significant increase in brand’s penetration and helped regions gain additional listings and expand brand’s facings at customers.

I love brands. You, too?
Let’s talk!
Lorenzo

school.name: Nova School of Business and Economics

awards.title: Unilever Future Leader's League challenge 2017 - World Finals
awards.description:
Team leader of a group of three people.
Marketing and Branding competition required the development of case studies with Lipton brand through four rounds - Online, National Finals, European Finals and World Finals. Me and my team  were selected within the 30 best teams out of 50.250 applicants worldwide. During the competition I had the opportunity to interact with senior management personalities in the firm including CEO and CHRO.

Marketing objective: development of an execution plan for Lipton brand to make the tea experience modern and relevant to millennials.

projects.title: Integrated marketing communications plan in cooperation with L'Oréal
projects.description: Integrated Marketing Communication plan for L'Oreal's well-established sun-care mass brand Garnier Ambre Solaire (Portugal division). The aim of the report is to analyse whether possibilities are present for strengthening the positioning of Garnier Ambre Solaire within the Portuguese sun-care market and, hence, becoming the top-of-mind brand for sunscreen products.

profile_positions.description:
Brand developer responsible for all Wall’s Kids projects across all pillars for 2024 and beyond.

• Supporting ambition setting and strategic brands’ direction to ensure Funnel Value is aligned to targets
• Co-developing strategy and JTBD for all brands’ pillars: licensing, families and recession proof solutions
• Working on big bets projects: delivery of a full marketing plan including renovation & innovation initiatives whilst ensuring profitability via NRM initiatives 
• Lead a direct report, co-lead an additional resource
profile_positions.title: European Junior Brand Manager - Wall’s Kids ice-cream

profile_positions.description:
Developed and managed 2022-2024 European innovations for the largest-ever Wall's Kids product launch in the "premiumising with licensing" space in collaboration with the Disney Company, from initial concept to market deployment.

• Led the full product development of 4 new Disney X Walls products for 2022+ by identifying incremental and whitespace opportunities and incorporating market trends, category requirements, and customer needs into the marketing mix, working closely with cross-functional teams and local leads.
• Established strong relationships with the Disney Company as the main point of contact for Unilever, ensuring effective collaboration and communication throughout the project.
• Managed multiple complex cross-functional teams across different factories and engaged with high-level internal stakeholders to ensure project success.
• Developed compelling trade stories that delivered a triple win for consumers, customers, and Unilever
• Led the creative design and agency briefing for pack development.
• Led communication strategy and asset development for out-of-home, in-store, PR, digital, and e-commerce channels.
• Provided leadership and guidance to direct reports.
profile_positions.title: European Junior Brand Manager - Wall's Kids Ice Cream (Partnerships)

profile_positions.description:
Led the global natural haircare platforms for Dove, which achieved over €120m in turnover and 150bps gross margin accretion within three years of launch. Worked on 2D and 3D projects to increase penetration of natural shampoo and conditioner, as well as develop disruptive treatment formats to drive market development in both developed and D&E markets.

• Led global NPD innovation workstreams by embedding market trends, category and customer requirements, and partnering with cross-functional teams and regional leads to deliver projects on-time in full.
• Drove Dove's Hair sustainability agenda by leading innovations and renovation initiatives such as implementing vegan formulations in the current natural portfolio, and creating sustainable formats such as shampoo bars, concentrates, refills, and powder shampoos.
• Led strategic work to define the long-term destination and evolution of the Natural platform, supporting brand strategy planning, vision, mix development, innovation funnel, deployment, and country engagement.
• Developed compelling trade stories for various geographies, such as North America, South America, and Southeast Asia, to ensure projects delivered a triple win for consumers, customers, and Unilever.
• Owned and managed the total Dove Hair budget (> €10M), ensuring efficient forecast, spending, and optimization throughout the year.
profile_positions.title: Global Senior Assistant Brand Manager - Dove Hair Naturals & Sustainability

profile_positions.description:
Launched a range of natural products offering new benefits as well as whitespace formats offering new usage applications and time convenience from concept / mix ideation to launch

• Led X-category teams, regional and local teams worldwide to ensure on-time and in-full NPDs deployment & alignment to project's strategy and Action Standards(Incrementality and margin accretion)
• Led packaging design and provided agency briefing, resulting in the creation of new design semiotics for over 10 SKUs.
• Led the end-to-end communication process, from insight generation to asset development (ATL, Digital, eCommerce), asset adaptation for local markets, as well as content development, POSM assets, PR Toolkit, and reactive Q&A.
• Developed qualitative and quantitative consumer tests and market researches to solve several business objectives across the 6Ps
• Developed business cases to ensure alignment of "Pre-Launch" activities with action standards and performed "Post-Launch Evaluations" to track in-market achievements and recommend mix optimization for enhanced growth and profitability.
• Owned and managed the project budget, exceeding €250,000, ensuring efficient forecasting, spending, and optimization throughout the year.
profile_positions.title: Global Assistant Brand Manager - Dove Hair NPDs

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinated and executed end-to-end ATL/BTL communication for 2018 Dove Hair Europe core campaigns across multiple platforms (TV, digital, social media) resulting in increased brand awareness
• Led packaging development from concept to launch, including creating product labels, packshots and digital images for e-commerce channels resulting in improved product visibility and engagement
• Conducted monthly analysis on EU brand performance with a focus on the UK market, utilizing key metrics such as turnover, market share, USG%, UVG%, UPG% etc.
profile_positions.title: European Brand Development Intern - Dove Hair

profile_positions.description:
Title: "How to achieve a profitable brand expansion of 24 Kitchen in Portugal".
Development of a profitable brand expansion of 24 Kitchen in Portugal (online and offline) through the delivery of a detailed business plan and integrated marketing communications campaign aiming to position the brand as a reference in the market.

Project included:
▪ Market/Marketing Research & Analysis 
▪ Business Models Proposal
▪ Marketing Strategy Development & Implementation
▪ Integrated Marketing Communications Development
▪ Profit and Losses estimations and forecasts
▪ Contingency Plan Development

Grade: 18/20
profile_positions.title: Business Plan for Brand Expansion - Master Thesis

volunteer_experiences.description:
Pro-bono consulting for B Corp, a nonprofit that believes in ethical and sustainable practices using business as a force for good through the power of individuals and enterprises. 

Duties and responsibilities include:
▪ Social media management
▪ Identification, design and development of Marketing ideas to create awareness and promote the B Corp movement in Portugal and Lusophone Africa
